e from
his undercover work is a post at the Rokumeikan dance hall which wil=
l

worki=
ng in Tokyo.

As he entered his home's gate his niece Yamaguchi Yukiko stag=
gers out

Goro lifts his eyebrow, "Yukiko! Are yo=
u ill what's wrong?"

Yukiko, turning blue, "C-c-can't breathe---corset suf=
focating me..."
his niece takes shallow breaths, pulls at the lace collar f=
rom her

hy barbarians where layers upon layers of clothing!"
